pkgmetadata.longdescription: Render 'LaTeX' in Plots // High-level functions to render 'LaTeX' fragments in plots, including as labels and data symbols in 'ggplot2' plots, plus low-level functions to author 'LaTeX' fragments (to produce 'LaTeX' documents), typeset 'LaTeX' documents (to produce 'DVI' files), read 'DVI' files (to produce "DVI" objects), and render "DVI" objects.
